name: SWAMI VIVEKANANDA MISSION TRUST

address: Vill.-Gokulchak, P.O.-Jalchak, P.S. - Pingla, Dist.-Paschim Medinipur, Pin. - 721155
Near jalchak Bus Stop / Near Jalchak N N Vidyayatan

briefDescription: SWAMI VIVEKANANDA MISSION TRUST ( A Charitable Trust) is a Non-Political, Non-Profitable, Non-Communal, without caste and creeds,people of this area satisfied with the activities of this area. The local people come forward spontaneously to help & co-operate in all possible way. Our trust has been working multifarious activities like Social Welfare activities( Cloth& Books Distri.,Drain & Garbage Cleaning, Free Coaching Center, SC/ST/OBC Development, Handicap WELFARE, Neighbourhood Youth Leading Parliament), Awareness Camp & Saminer & Training(Consumer, Literacy, Thelassemia, Blood Donation, Diabetic, Free EYE Check-up,Legal service Act.), Educational Programme(Cultural training Center), RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES( Vivek Mela, Sports & Games, Yoga & Gymnastics).

address: Vill.+P.O.+ P.S. - Pingla, Dist. - Pachim Medinipur, Pin. -721140
